resources.string: Cats, also called domestic cats (Felis catus), are small, carnivorous mammals, of the family Felidae. Cats have been domesticated (tamed) for nearly 10,000 years. Domestic cats may be called \'house cats\' when kept as indoor pets, staying inside the home. They are one of the most popular pets in the world. Humans keep them for hunting rodents as friends and sometimes emotional support.
